content.question: New islands will have to be built to ensure a safe future for its citizens, because science indicates that Kiribati will go underwater within the century.Should the writer make this addition?

choices.label: Yes, because it acknowledges the source of the information conveyed in the sentence.
Yes, because it provides an additional perspective to set up a counterargument.
No, because it introduces new evidence that requires an adjustment to the paragraph’s line of reasoning.
No, because it fails to consider the rhetorical situation set up in the first paragraph.
